title: The divide between consolidation and collaboration deepens
description: It used to be that a local news organization could stand alone. History and policy pushed these outlets into local ownership, focusing on their own communities, with their own presses. Today, however, no local news organization is an island. Local news organizations will continue to rely on each other in 2026, but it will look...
